text:
Please help me figure out what should be simple. I think I’m missing something basic. If I put this button in the HTML section and .js also….it works. If I put it in the the .js section of the module it give me a “Uncaught ReferenceError: copyContent is not defined
 at HTMLButtonElement.onclick” This doesn’t make any sense to me.
	
<button id=“out” onclick=“listen(this)“>
Submit
</button>

<script>
	function listen(get) {
		console.log(this)
		get.style.backgroundColor = ‘red’;
		get.innerHTML = “Hii GFG , How r u???”
	}
</script>
